title: Christmas in My Heart, Vol. 10
description: A collection of classic Christmas stories by such beloved authors as Pearl S. Buck, Grace Livingston Hill, and Margaret Sangster--all offering Christ-centered, love-filled messages that will touch your heart and remind you of a simpler time. These moving stories have become part of a Christmas tradition for thousands of families. This is a great gift book for friends, family members, and teachers.
author: Joe L. Wheeler
